constructor-arg.value: select * from T_SYS_SCHEDULER_TASK where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)

select * from T_SYS_SCHEDULER_TASK where lifecycle !=2
#if($code) and CODE=:code #end
#if($timeExp) and TIME_EXP=:timeExp #end
#if($description) and DESCRIPTION=:description #end
#if($beanName) and BEAN_NAME=:beanName #end #if($beanNameForLike) and BEAN_NAME like :beanNameForLike #end

#if($lifecycle) and LIFECYCLE=:lifecycle #end #if($lifecycle) and lifecycle =:lifecycle #end

select * from T_SYS_SCHEDULER_TASK where
lifecycle !=2
#if($code) and CODE like :code #end
#if($timeExp) and TIME_EXP=:timeExp #end
#if($description) and DESCRIPTION=:description #end
#if($beanName) and BEAN_NAME=:beanName #end #if($beanNameForLike) and BEAN_NAME like :beanNameForLike #end
#if($methodName) and METHOD_NAME=:methodName #end #if($methodNameForLike) and METHOD_NAME like :methodNameForLike #end
#if($lifecycle) and LIFECYCLE=:lifecycle #end #if($lifecycle) and lifecycle =:lifecycle #end
update T_SYS_SCHEDULER_TASK set lifecycle=:state where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)
update T_SYS_SCHEDULER_TASK set lifecycle=2 where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)

update T_SYS_SCHEDULER_TASK set version = now()
#if($st.code) ,CODE = :st.code #end #if($st.timeExp) ,TIME_EXP=:st.timeExp #end #if($st.description) ,DESCRIPTION=:st.description #end #if($st.beanName) ,BEAN_NAME=:st.beanName #end #if($st.methodName) ,METHOD_NAME=:st.methodName #end #if($st.lifecycle) ,LIFECYCLE=:st.lifecycle #end
where id = :id

select * from T_SYS_SCHEDULER_TASK where lifecycle=1

#if($timeExp) and TIME_EXP=:timeExp #end
